scripts.prebuild: if [ "$SKIP_PREBUILD" != "true" ]; then cd ../website && npm run build:production; fi
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:infrastructure && npm run deploy:website:ci
scripts.deploy:public-website: cd ../public-website && npm run build && cd ../cdk && npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never ManorPublicWebsiteStack
scripts.deploy:public-website:ci: npm run build:ci && cdk deploy --require-approval never ManorPublicWebsiteStack
scripts.deploy:domain: npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never CasaDomainStack
scripts.deploy:auth: npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never CasaAuthStack
scripts.deploy:website: cd ../website && npm run build:production && cd ../cdk && npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never ManorWebsiteStack
scripts.deploy:website:ci: npm run build:ci && cdk deploy --require-approval never ManorWebsiteStack
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never --all
scripts.deploy:infrastructure: npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never CasaDomainStack CasaAuthStack CasaGuardCdkStack CasaCamerasCdkStack CasaIntegrationsCdkStack CasaCamerasDashboardsStack ManorMetricsDashboardStack CasaAdminCdkStack
scripts.deploy:metrics: npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never ManorMetricsDashboardStack
scripts.deploy:infrastructure-only: SKIP_PREBUILD=true SKIP_WEBSITE_DEPLOYMENT=true npm run build && SKIP_WEBSITE_DEPLOYMENT=true cdk deploy --require-approval never --all
